tool_description: An API showing all the lastest Climates Change News around the world.
name: Climates Change
title: Climates Change

api_list.name: Get All News Name
api_list.description: This endpoint return all news name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climates-change.p.rapidapi.com/names"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climates-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source
api_list.description: Get News about Climate Change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint return back all news about Climate Change from all over the world
api_list.code:
